Synopsis: Delete a tag protection state for a repository
Description:
This deletes a tag protection state for a repository.
This endpoint is only available to repository administrators.
Notes: [Delete a tag protection state for a repository](https://docs.github.com/rest/repos/tags#delete-a-tag-protection-state-for-a-repository)

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Remove-GitHubRepositoryTagProtection -Owner 'octocat' -Repository 'hello-world' -TagProtectionId 1
Deletes the tag protection state with the ID 1 for the 'hello-world' repository.
